item.title: Karabiner is a game changer
item.description: What is Karabiner and why? Karabiner Elements is an open source MacOS application that can be used to intercept and modify any keystroke, combination, etc… on your machine and change it to do damn near anything you want. If you follow my blog or know me, you’ll know that I’m a big fan of custom keyboards and the flexibility that they allow by way of QMK or similar firmware - Karabiner recreates a lot of that functionality at the software level.
